sql_statement.static: SELECT Timestamp, SUM(Data) AS Data, Timestamp -  (SELECT MIN(Timestamp) FROM RightPortGroupTxRouteCount) AS Delta FROM RightPortGroupTxRouteCount WHERE Timestamp = (SELECT MAX(Timestamp) FROM RightPortGroupTxRouteCount)

SELECT Timestamp, SUM(Data) AS Data, Timestamp -  (SELECT MIN(Timestamp) FROM LeftPortGroupTxRouteCount) AS Delta FROM LeftPortGroupTxRouteCount WHERE Timestamp = (SELECT MAX(Timestamp) FROM LeftPortGroupTxRouteCount)

SELECT Timestamp, SUM(Data) AS Data, Timestamp -  (SELECT MIN(Timestamp) FROM RightPortGroupRxRouteCount) AS Delta FROM RightPortGroupRxRouteCount WHERE Timestamp = (SELECT MAX(Timestamp) FROM RightPortGroupRxRouteCount)

SELECT Timestamp, SUM(Data) AS Data, Timestamp -  (SELECT MIN(Timestamp) FROM LeftPortGroupRxRouteCount) AS Delta FROM LeftPortGroupRxRouteCount WHERE Timestamp = (SELECT MAX(Timestamp) FROM LeftPortGroupRxRouteCount)

SELECT (SELECT Timestamp FROM LeftPortGroupAggregateTxRouteCount WHERE Timestamp = (SELECT MAX(Timestamp) FROM LeftPortGroupAggregateTxRouteCount)) as timestamp, (SELECT  Data FROM LeftPortGroupAggregateTxRouteCount WHERE Timestamp = (SELECT MAX(Timestamp) FROM LeftPortGroupAggregateTxRouteCount)) as leftTx, (SELECT Data FROM RightPortGroupAggregateTxRouteCount WHERE Timestamp = (SELECT MAX(Timestamp) FROM RightPortGroupAggregateTxRouteCount)) as rightTx, (SELECT Data FROM LeftPortGroupAggregateRxRouteCount WHERE Timestamp = (SELECT MAX(Timestamp) FROM LeftPortGroupAggregateRxRouteCount)) as leftRx, (SELECT Data FROM RightPortGroupAggregateRxRouteCount WHERE Timestamp = (SELECT MAX(Timestamp) FROM RightPortGroupAggregateRxRouteCount)) as rightRx

sql_statement.static: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS BgpRRIterSummary
DELETE FROM RightPortGroupAggregateRxRouteCount
DELETE FROM LeftPortGroupAggregateRxRouteCount

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 286
ExpProperties.EpDescription: The amount of time that the test will wait for all BGP routers to achieve their Established status.

ExpProperties.EpDescription: The amount of time that the test will pause once all devices have established their BGP sessions, before beginning the route advertisement phase of the test.

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS BgpRREvents (ffrom INT, fto INT)
INSERT INTO BgpRREvents VALUES((SELECT MAX(Timestamp)-MIN(Timestamp) FROM RightPortGroupRxRouteCount), 0)

Properties.Name: Text
Properties.Value: Loop until RT data indicates that conditions are met...

sql_for_command_verdict.static: SELECT MAX(ROWID)=0 OR RightDelta < (SELECT Timeout FROM BgpRRConfig) AND RightRx <= ( (1.0 + (SELECT RxCountTolerancePercent FROM BgpRRConfig)/100.0)) * (SELECT RightExpRx FROM BgpRRIterConfig WHERE ROWID = (SELECT CAST( CurrVal AS INT) FROM BgpRRIterCurrVal)) AND (LeftSettled=0 OR RightSettled=0 OR LeftRx < (SELECT LeftExpRx FROM BgpRRIterConfig WHERE ROWID = (SELECT CAST( CurrVal AS INT) FROM BgpRRIterCurrVal)) OR RightRx < (SELECT RightExpRx FROM BgpRRIterConfig WHERE ROWID = (SELECT CAST( CurrVal AS INT) FROM BgpRRIterCurrVal))) AND LeftDelta < (SELECT Timeout FROM BgpRRConfig) AND LeftRx <= ( (1.0 + (SELECT RxCountTolerancePercent FROM BgpRRConfig)/100.0)) * (SELECT LeftExpRx FROM BgpRRIterConfig WHERE ROWID = (SELECT CAST( CurrVal AS INT) FROM BgpRRIterCurrVal)) FROM BgpRRIterSummary

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS BgpRRIterSummary (LeftDelta INT, LeftRx INT, LeftSettled INT, RightDelta INT, RightRx INT, RightSettled INT)
DELETE FROM BgpRRIterSummary

INSERT INTO BgpRRIterSummary VALUES ((SELECT (MAX(Timestamp) - MIN(TimeStamp)) FROM LeftPortGroupAggregateRxRouteCount),(SELECT Data FROM LeftPortGroupAggregateRxRouteCount WHERE Timestamp = (SELECT MAX(Timestamp) FROM LeftPortGroupAggregateRxRouteCount)), (SELECT (SELECT MAX(Timestamp) - MIN(Timestamp) >(SELECT SettleTime FROM BgpRRConfig) FROM LeftPortGroupAggregateRxRouteCount ) AND COUNT(DISTINCT Data) = 1 FROM LeftPortGroupAggregateRxRouteCount WHERE CAST(Timestamp AS INTEGER) > (SELECT MAX(Timestamp) FROM LeftPortGroupAggregateRxRouteCount) - (SELECT SettleTime FROM BgpRRConfig)), (SELECT (MAX(Timestamp) - MIN(TimeStamp)) FROM RightPortGroupAggregateRxRouteCount), (SELECT Data FROM RightPortGroupAggregateRxRouteCount WHERE Timestamp = (SELECT MAX(Timestamp) FROM RightPortGroupAggregateRxRouteCount)),  (SELECT (SELECT MAX(Timestamp) - MIN(Timestamp) >(SELECT SettleTime FROM BgpRRConfig) FROM RightPortGroupAggregateRxRouteCount ) AND COUNT(DISTINCT Data) = 1 FROM RightPortGroupAggregateRxRouteCount WHERE CAST(Timestamp AS INTEGER) > (SELECT MAX(Timestamp) FROM RightPortGroupAggregateRxRouteCount) - (SELECT SettleTime FROM BgpRRConfig)))

Properties.Name: Text
Properties.Value: HERE YOU CAN ADD THINGS TO DO WHILE IT WAITS...

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Run SQL: End of Iteration Event

sql_statement.static: UPDATE BgpRREvents SET fto=(SELECT MAX(Timestamp)-MIN(Timestamp) FROM RightPortGroupRxRouteCount) WHERE fto = 0

Children.Name: Run SQL: Save Aggregate and Generate Report

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Run SQL: Save Aggregate and Generate Report

sql_statement.static: SELECT * FROM BgpRRIterSummary
SELECT * FROM BgpRRIterCurrVal

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: All iteration durations were within the configured timeout.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT MAX(LeftDelta, RightDelta)  < (SELECT Timeout FROM BgpRRConfig) FROM BgpRRIterSummary WHERE ROWID = (SELECT MAX(ROWID) FROM BgpRRIterSummary)

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: The test timed out. One or more iteration durations exceeded the timeout.

sql_statement.static: SELECT (SELECT CAST(CurrVal AS INT) FROM BgpRRIterCurrVal) as 'Iteration', MAX(LeftDelta, RightDelta) as 'Iteration Duration (s)', (SELECT Timeout FROM BgpRRConfig) AS 'Configured Timeout (s)' FROM BgpRRIterSummary WHERE ROWID = (SELECT MAX(ROWID) FROM BgpRRIterSummary)

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: Client Rx count received the intended full count of routes.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT LeftRx >= (SELECT LeftExpRx FROM BgpRRIterConfig WHERE ROWID = (SELECT CAST( CurrVal AS INT) FROM BgpRRIterCurrVal)) FROM BgpRRIterSummary WHERE ROWID = (SELECT MAX(ROWID) FROM BgpRRIterSummary)

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Client Rx count did not receive the intended full count of routes.

sql_statement.static: SELECT (SELECT CAST(CurrVal AS INT) FROM BgpRRIterCurrVal) as 'Iteration', LeftRx AS 'Client Route Rx Count', (SELECT LeftExpRx FROM BgpRRIterConfig WHERE ROWID = (SELECT CAST( CurrVal AS INT) FROM BgpRRIterCurrVal)) AS 'Client Expected Route Rx Count' FROM BgpRRIterSummary WHERE ROWID = (SELECT MAX(ROWID) FROM BgpRRIterSummary)

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: Non-Client Rx count received the intended full count of routes.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT RightRx >= (SELECT RightExpRx FROM BgpRRIterConfig WHERE ROWID = (SELECT CAST( CurrVal AS INT) FROM BgpRRIterCurrVal)) FROM BgpRRIterSummary WHERE ROWID = (SELECT MAX(ROWID) FROM BgpRRIterSummary)

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Non-Client Rx count did not receive the intended full count of routes.

sql_statement.static: SELECT (SELECT CAST(CurrVal AS INT) FROM BgpRRIterCurrVal) as 'Iteration', RightRx AS 'Non-Client Route Rx Count', (SELECT RightExpRx FROM BgpRRIterConfig WHERE ROWID = (SELECT CAST( CurrVal AS INT) FROM BgpRRIterCurrVal)) AS 'Non-Client Expected Route Rx Count' FROM BgpRRIterSummary WHERE ROWID = (SELECT MAX(ROWID) FROM BgpRRIterSummary)

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: Client Rx count did not demonstrate excessive retransmissions.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT LeftRx <= (SELECT LeftExpRx * (1.0 + (SELECT RxCountTolerancePercent FROM BgpRRConfig)/100.0) FROM BgpRRIterConfig WHERE ROWID = (SELECT CAST( CurrVal AS INT) FROM BgpRRIterCurrVal)) FROM BgpRRIterSummary WHERE ROWID = (SELECT MAX(ROWID) FROM BgpRRIterSummary)

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Client Rx count demonstrated excessive retransmissions.

sql_statement.static: SELECT (SELECT CAST(CurrVal AS INT) FROM BgpRRIterCurrVal) as 'Iteration', LeftRx AS 'Client Route Rx Count', (SELECT LeftExpRx FROM BgpRRIterConfig WHERE ROWID = (SELECT CAST( CurrVal AS INT) FROM BgpRRIterCurrVal)) AS 'Client Expected Route Rx Count', ((SELECT LeftExpRx FROM BgpRRIterConfig WHERE ROWID = (SELECT CAST( CurrVal AS INT) FROM BgpRRIterCurrVal)) * (1.0 + (SELECT RxCountTolerancePercent FROM BgpRRConfig)/100.0)) AS 'Client Max Expected Route Rx Count' FROM BgpRRIterSummary WHERE ROWID = (SELECT MAX(ROWID) FROM BgpRRIterSummary)

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: Non-Client route Rx count did not demonstrate excessive retransmissions.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT RightRx <= (SELECT RightExpRx * (1.0 + (SELECT RxCountTolerancePercent FROM BgpRRConfig)/100.0) FROM BgpRRIterConfig WHERE ROWID = (SELECT CAST( CurrVal AS INT) FROM BgpRRIterCurrVal)) FROM BgpRRIterSummary WHERE ROWID = (SELECT MAX(ROWID) FROM BgpRRIterSummary)

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Non-Client route Rx count demonstrated excessive retransmissions.

sql_statement.static: SELECT (SELECT CAST(CurrVal AS INT) FROM BgpRRIterCurrVal) as 'Iteration', RightRx AS 'Non-Client Route Rx Count', (SELECT RightExpRx FROM BgpRRIterConfig WHERE ROWID = (SELECT CAST( CurrVal AS INT) FROM BgpRRIterCurrVal)) AS 'Non-Client Expected Route Rx Count', ((SELECT RightExpRx FROM BgpRRIterConfig WHERE ROWID = (SELECT CAST( CurrVal AS INT) FROM BgpRRIterCurrVal)) * (1.0 + (SELECT RxCountTolerancePercent FROM BgpRRConfig)/100.0)) AS 'Non-Client Max Expected Route Rx Count' FROM BgpRRIterSummary WHERE ROWID = (SELECT MAX(ROWID) FROM BgpRRIterSummary)

SELECT (SELECT CAST(CurrVal AS INT) FROM BgpRRIterCurrVal) as 'Iteration', ed.RouterId AS 'Router IPv4 ID', IPv4If.Address AS 'Router IPv4 Address', StartIpList AS 'Start IP Address', NetB.PrefixLength AS 'Prefix Length', NetworkCount AS 'Route Count' FROM IPv4NetworkBlock AS NetB JOIN RelationTable AS r1 ON NetB.handle = r1.TargetHnd JOIN BgpIPv4RouteConfig as BgpRCfg  ON r1.SourceHnd = BgpRCfg.handle JOIN RelationTable AS r2 ON BgpRCfg.handle = r2.TargetHnd JOIN BgpRouterConfig AS RtrCfg ON r2.SourceHnd = RtrCfg.handle JOIN RelationTable AS r3 ON RtrCfg.handle = r3.SourceHnd JOIN Tag  ON r3.TargetHnd = Tag.handle JOIN RelationTable AS r4 ON RtrCfg.handle = r4.TargetHnd JOIN EmulatedDevice AS ed ON ed.handle = r4.SourceHnd JOIN RelationTable AS r5 ON ed.handle = r5.SourceHnd JOIN IPv4If ON IPv4If.handle = r5.TargetHnd WHERE Tag.Name = 'Left_ttBgpRouterConfig' AND r5.type = 'PrimaryIf'

SELECT (SELECT CAST(CurrVal AS INT) FROM BgpRRIterCurrVal) as 'Iteration', ed.RouterId AS 'Router IPv4 ID', IPv4If.Address AS 'Router IPv4 Address', StartIpList AS 'Start IP Address', NetB.PrefixLength AS 'Prefix Length', NetworkCount AS 'Route Count' FROM IPv4NetworkBlock AS NetB JOIN RelationTable AS r1 ON NetB.handle = r1.TargetHnd JOIN BgpIPv4RouteConfig as BgpRCfg  ON r1.SourceHnd = BgpRCfg.handle JOIN RelationTable AS r2 ON BgpRCfg.handle = r2.TargetHnd JOIN BgpRouterConfig AS RtrCfg ON r2.SourceHnd = RtrCfg.handle JOIN RelationTable AS r3 ON RtrCfg.handle = r3.SourceHnd JOIN Tag  ON r3.TargetHnd = Tag.handle JOIN RelationTable AS r4 ON RtrCfg.handle = r4.TargetHnd JOIN EmulatedDevice AS ed ON ed.handle = r4.SourceHnd JOIN RelationTable AS r5 ON ed.handle = r5.SourceHnd JOIN IPv4If ON IPv4If.handle = r5.TargetHnd WHERE Tag.Name = 'Right_ttBgpRouterConfig' AND r5.type = 'PrimaryIf'

Properties.Value: Run SQL: Create BGP Establish Table

sql_statement.static: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS BgpRRIterCurrVal
SELECT * FROM BgpRRIterCurrVal

SELECT (SELECT CAST(CurrVal AS INT) FROM BgpRRIterCurrVal) AS Iteration, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT ParentHnd, SessionUpCount FROM BgpRouterResults WHERE SessionUpCount > 0 GROUP BY ParentHnd)) AS 'Sessions Up Count', (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT ParentHnd, SessionUpCount FROM BgpRouterResults WHERE SessionUpCount = 0 GROUP BY ParentHnd)) AS 'Sessions Down Count'
SELECT Iteration, "Sessions Up Count",       "Sessions Down Count" FROM BgpRRClientEstablished

Properties.Name: Text
Properties.Value: STOP ALL DEVICES, ITERATION TEST IS DONE

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: All iteration durations were within the configured timeout.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT MIN("Iteration Duration (s)"<"Configured Timeout (s)") FROM BgpRRResultsTimeouts

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: The test timed out. One or more iteration durations exceeded the timeout.

sql_statement.static: SELECT Iteration, "Iteration Duration (s)","Configured Timeout (s)" FROM BgpRRResultsTimeouts

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: Client Rx count reached full intended route count.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT MIN("Client Route Rx Count" >= "Client Expected Route Rx Count") FROM BgpRRResultsClientMet

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Client Rx count failed to reach full intended route count.

sql_statement.static: SELECT Iteration, "Client Route Rx Count", "Client Expected Route Rx Count" FROM BgpRRResultsClientMet

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: Non-Client route Rx count reached full intended route count.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT MIN("Non-Client Route Rx Count" >= "Non-Client Expected Route Rx Count") FROM BgpRRResultsNonClientMet

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Non-Client route Rx count failed to reach full intended route count.

sql_statement.static: SELECT Iteration, "Non-Client Route Rx Count", "Non-Client Expected Route Rx Count" FROM BgpRRResultsNonClientMet

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: Client Rx count did not demonstrate excessive retransmissions.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT MIN("Client Route Rx Count" <= "Client Max Expected Route Rx Count") FROM BgpRRResultsClientExceed

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Client Rx count demonstrated excessive retransmissions.

sql_statement.static: SELECT Iteration, "Client Route Rx Count", "Client Expected Route Rx Count", "Client Max Expected Route Rx Count" FROM BgpRRResultsClientExceed

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: Non-Client route Rx count did not demonstrate excessive retransmissions.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT MIN("Non-Client Route Rx Count" <= "Non-Client Max Expected Route Rx Count") FROM BgpRRResultsNonClientExceed

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Non-Client route Rx count demonstrated excessive retransmissions.

sql_statement.static: SELECT Iteration, "Non-Client Route Rx Count", "Non-Client Expected Route Rx Count", "Non-Client Max Expected Route Rx Count" FROM BgpRRResultsNonClientExceed

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: One or more BGP sessions failed to established a connection.

ExpProperties.EpDescription: Group of ports emulating BGP routers that are not part of the Route Reflector's client. These can be iBGP or eBGP routers.
